item.title: Gene-Gene Relationship Modeling Based on Genetic Evidence for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Data Imputation
item.description: Novel imputation method, scCR, leverages complete gene-gene relationships (associating & dissociating) for superior single-cell RNA sequencing data recovery, significantly outperforming current state-…
